questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image of the equipment.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again.
confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment.
prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing report.
connect the equipment to the mains and check whether the equipment is getting ON.
check whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230.

videos.src: assets/videos/Human Combilyzer 13/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALLOUTLET VOLTAGE.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALLOUTLET VOLTAGE

questions.question: shift the equipment to another place where wall outlet is provided with 230 AC Voltage
check the power cord continuity and confirm whether the power cord is defective.

videos.src: assets/videos/Human Combilyzer 13/VIDEO FOR CHECKING POWER CORD CONTINUITY.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO FOR CHECKING POWER CORD CONTINUITY

questions.question: replace the power cord with a new one
open the equipment as shown in the video, check and confirm whether the input AC voltage of 230 is available.
check and confirm is there any loose connection or breakage of cable from input pin connector to power supply.
reseat or replace the cable accordingly
check for any carbon formation or breakage of input pin connector.
clean or replace the input pin connector accordingly
check and confirm whether the power supply output voltage is available.
repair / replace the power supply accordingly
check and confirm is there any loose connection or breakage of cable from power supply to control board.
reseat or replace the cables accordingly
repair / replace the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether there is a difficulty in inserting the sample tray.
reinsert once again properly and confirm whether the problem still persist.
open the equipment as shown in the video, clean or clear any obstruction or dust in the sample tray path and gears
check and confirm whether the measured result of sample is incorrect or improper.
open the equipment as shown in the video, clean the optical sensor, LED and confirm whether the problem still persist.
check for any loose connection or breakage of cable from optical sensor to control board.
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
repair / replace the optical sensor accordingly and confirm whether the problem still persist.
repair / replace the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON but the display is plain / blank.
open the equipment as shown in the video, check for any loose connection or breakage of the cable between display and control board.
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
replace the display with a new one
check and confirm whether the print is available.
check whether the paper roll is inserted.
insert the paper roll properly
check the connection between the printer and control board for any loose connection / breakage of cable.
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
clean the thermal head and confirm whether the problem still persist.
replace the thermal head with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the thermal head

questions.question: If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other assistance through video call.
Thanks
